title: 91 Ye Watchers and Ye Holy Ones

lines: 1. Ye watchers and ye holy ones Bright seraphs, cherubim and thrones, Raise the glad strain, Alleluia! Cry out dominions, princedoms, powers, Virtues, archangels, angels' choirs,
Refrain : Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
2. O higher than the cherubim More glorious than the seraphim, Lead their praises, Alleluia! Thou bearer of the eternal Word, Most gracious, magnify the Lord.
3. O friends, in gladness let us sing, Supernal anthems echoing, Alleluia, Alleluia! To God the Father, God the Son, And God the Spirit, Three in One.
